Packages 
Package Description
ojc.bain
Bain - a neural network simulator.
ojc.bain.base
Contains the base classes from which most of the components of a simulation are built on or extend from.
ojc.bain.misc
Contains miscellaneous utility classes and functions.
ojc.bain.neuron
Contains classes that implement neuron models.
ojc.bain.synapse
Contains classes that implement synapse models.
ojc.bain.test
Contains miscellaneous classes used for testing and analysis.
